attributes.review: This app directly discredits all other candidates. Not only does it support many problematic people but it also spreads untrue information to cause people to turn against other citizens with wrong thinking👎🏻

attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: This app has crashed since I downloaded it. My battery was immediately draining so fast. I also started getting those virus threats like on unsecured websites. I’m not sure if the app was listening to me but I got ads across all other apps directly related conversations I was holding whilst on the app. I don’t feel safe or secure on this app at all. A lot of other people have complained about security threats and I believe them 100%. Don’t bother just use other news apps or fox
attributes.title: Not good
